import React from 'react' import StarBorderIcon from '@mui/icons-material/StarBorder'; import StarIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Star'; import './Review.scss'; const Review = ({average, ratings}) => { function countRatings() { var numRatings = 0; for(var i=0; i < 5; i++){ numRatings += ratings[i]; } console.log(numRatings); return numRatings; }; const fiveStar = ((ratings[4]/countRatings())*100) + '%'; const fourStar = ((ratings[3]/countRatings())*100) + '%'; const threeStar = ((ratings[2]/countRatings())*100) + '%'; const twoStar = ((ratings[1]/countRatings())*100) + '%'; const oneStar = ((ratings[0]/countRatings())*100) + '%'; return (
